quote_1: Every day is a challenge, and every challenge is a step toward a stronger you.
quote_2: Small steps every day lead to big changes.
quote_3: Your future self will thank you for starting today.
challenge_drink_water_desc: Make sure to drink 8 glasses (2 liters) of water today to stay hydrated and healthy.
challenge_english_word_desc: Learn a new English word with its meaning, and use it in a complete sentence to reinforce it.
challenge_family_time_desc: Spend at least one hour with your family today, without devices. Enjoy a shared activity or deep conversation.
challenge_meditation_desc: Take 10 minutes today to sit in a quiet space, breathe deeply, and focus on the present moment.
challenge_walking_desc: Go for a 30-minute walk outdoors. Choose a peaceful area and enjoy the movement and fresh air.
challenge_read_book_desc: Read 10 pages from a book you enjoy or can learn from. Note down one idea that inspired you.
challenge_without_internet_desc: Disconnect from the internet for 2 hours today. Use that time to do something meaningful offline.
challenge_no_junk_food_desc: Avoid all junk food and sugary drinks today. Choose healthy alternatives and nourish your body.
challenge_waking_up_early_desc: Wake up one hour earlier than usual and spend your morning doing something productive like reading or exercising.
challenge_cooking_desc: Cook a healthy meal by yourself today. Try a new recipe and share it with someone you care about.
challenge_read_quran_desc: Read at least one page of the Qur’an today and reflect on its meaning. Make it part of your daily routine.
challenge_new_skill_desc: Choose a new skill and learn the basics from a short video or article. Take your first step and share your progress.
challenge_push_ups_desc: Do 3 sets of push-ups (10 reps each) with short breaks in between. Improve your strength step by step.
challenge_meaningful_conversations_desc: Start a meaningful conversation with a friend or family member today. Talk about something that truly matters.
choose_language_subtitle: Select your preferred language for the app
mini_lamp_description: Use simple materials to make a decorative lamp.
plant_pot_description: Reuse bottles to grow your plant.
challenge_cooking_desc: Create and share a delicious recipe!
challenge_crafts_desc: Make something creative with your hands!
challenge_fitness_desc: Complete 10,000 steps daily for a week!
challenge_reading_desc: Read one book this month and share your review.
challenge_gardening_desc: Grow a plant and document its progress.
